#summary The JavaScript Styx Implementation.
#labels Phase-Implementation

== Introduction ==

The JavaScript module consists of the following components:

  * styx-fs.js -- high level interface to the Styx protocol
  * styx.js -- Styx protocol implementation
  * connection.js -- low level communication
  * message.js -- binary data message
  * types.js -- type definitions and constants

Currently, Firefox is the only browser supported. More browsers will be supported in the future.

== High Level Interface ==

Consider the following code snippet:
{{{
var fs = new StyxFS("/svc", ehandler);
fs.mount("someone", "/net");

var dns = fs.open("/dev/dns", Mode.OREAD);

var msg = new Message([]);
msg.addString("code.google.com ip");

fs.write(dns, 0, buf.getBytes());
msg = new Message(fs.read(dns, 0, 128));
var ip = msg.getString(0);
}}}
